summary: This document contains Schedule K-1 forms for the partnership MIDWAY CADENCE, LLC, detailing the income, deductions, and credits for the partner BLUE CHIP CAPITAL, LLC for the tax year 2012. It includes financial information such as guaranteed payments, ordinary business income, and other deductions.

persons.name: Blue Chip Capital, LLC
persons.context: Blue Chip Capital, LLC is listed as a partner in the MIDWAY CADENCE, LLC partnership, receiving a share of income and deductions.

persons.name: Midway Cadence, LLC
persons.context: Midway Cadence, LLC is the partnership entity that filed the K-1 forms detailing the financial information for its partners.

connections.description: Blue Chip Capital, LLC is a partner in the MIDWAY CADENCE, LLC partnership, sharing in the income and deductions as reported in the K-1 forms.

keyFacts: The document includes financial details for the tax year 2012, specifically from November 13, 2012, to December 31, 2012.
Blue Chip Capital, LLC is reported to have a share of profit and loss percentages of 1.5562% and 2.0080%, respectively.
The partnership reported guaranteed payments and other deductions totaling $502.
The K-1 forms indicate that there were no adjustments or credits for the partner in North Carolina.
The document is marked as confidential and includes multiple references to the partnership's financial activities.
